main_definition: At any time or every time that a particular situation occurs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to indicate an unspecified time in the past, present, or future when something happens.
meanings_and_examples.example: I remember whenever he would come over.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating that a particular action will take place each time a condition is met.
meanings_and_examples.example: She waters her plants whenever it rains.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to refer to any point in time when something happens, without specifying the exact moment.
meanings_and_examples.example: Whenever you feel like eating, just let me know and I'll prepare a snack for you.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to an unspecified occurrence of an event or action that takes place over time.
meanings_and_examples.example: The team will review their progress whenever they meet with the coach.
